name.en: Topics on the History of Chinese Philosophy I

goal.ch: 「新儒家」是當代的儒家學派，時間以1890開始，對於傳統儒家做重新詮釋與爬梳的一群人，歷經三代，分別有第一代的代表哲學家為熊十力、梁漱溟、馬一浮、張君勱、馮友蘭；第二代的方東美、唐君毅、牟宗三、徐復觀；與第三代的有蔡仁厚、成中英、劉述先、杜維明....等，各自有其呼應他們那時代所做出來的儒家文化回應。以概述的方式帶領學生把握新儒家大師的觀點。
goal.en: “New Confucianism“ is a contemporary Confucian school of thought that emerged around 1890, comprising individuals who reinterpreted and reorganized traditional Confucianism. Spanning three generations, the first generation includes philosophers such as Xiong Shili, Liang Shuming, Ma Yifu, Zhang Junmai, and Feng Youlan. The second generation includes Fang Dongmei, Tang Junyi, Mou Zongsan, and Xu Fuguan. The third generation includes figures like Cai Renhou, Cheng Zhongying, Liu Shuxian, and Du Weiming, each offering their own responses to the cultural context of their time through Confucian principles. This overview aims to guide students in understanding the perspectives of these New Confucian masters.
